param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示將處理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試加入資料物件中的資料格式，複製作業期間，就會發生事件。The event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation. A事件處理常式方法通常用來套用篩選套用到不想要或不必要的資料格式的複製命令最佳化。A event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a .
